original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.28. Sanidassanattika, Hetusampayuttadukādi
analyzed: sani dassana ttika hetu sampayutta duka ādi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe
analyzed: hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na ahetukam ca iva na na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na hetum ca iva na hetu vippayuttam ca dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu ca iva hetu sampayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na hetu vippayuttam ca iva na na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: hetu sampayuttaḥ ca iva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā
analyzed: na hetu ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā

original: ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: ekavīsa pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa
